column5: The Richter's Pharmacy Museum & Events Center (Texas' Only Private Pharmacy Museum)  Our largest facility is a unique combination of lodging, events center and extraordinary museum. The Museum is an authentic replica of a turn-of-the-century drug store, with a working soda fountain and apothecary cabinets filled with elixirs, healing powders, and other curiosities from another time.  Rates: $180.00/couple and a $35.00 fee for each additional guest up to six people. Taxes and fees included.
column8: Das Anwesen B&B and Events Center/Richter Pharmacy
